channel.title: Your account is already logged in
channel.description:
Arrhg...
I started up my new private server and a bunch of people can't get on because it says their account is already logged in, I restart the server, same thing... I delete all character files (Which does nothing, if they have the right password they can still log into that account and it will be the same.) And compile after that, still nothing...
I am using MegsScape source... So I am also using cheezscape and Testscape I suppose...
What is causing this? What should I look for to fix it?
Thanks.

item.title: Your account is already logged in
item.dc:creator: @Connor_Cross Connor_Cross
item.description:
@Connor_Cross wrote:

I got this error as well, encountered it when I was trying to walk towards Rimmington. Whats wrong with this version…

Edit: I made another account, then when I tried to wear an obby cape, I found out the problem. THE OBBY CAPE IS THE PROBLEM. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

delete the account out of moreinfo file and try that:)
